TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateApplicationManifest extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateManifestBase
Public NotInheritable Class GenerateApplicationManifest Inherits GenerateManifestBase

summary.span: 實作 GenerateApplicationManifest 工作。

span.span: Implements the GenerateApplicationManifest task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 GenerateApplicationManifest 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the GenerateApplicationManifest element in the project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [GenerateApplicationManifest 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a494102b-0cb2-4755-8e2a-d2c0f39fac1d)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateApplicationManifest Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a494102b-0cb2-4755-8e2a-d2c0f39fac1d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `EntryPoint` 是選擇性`[]`參數，指出所產生的資訊清單組件的進入點。`EntryPoint` is an optional `[]` parameter that indicates the entry point for the generated manifest assembly. 對於 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 部署資訊清單，此輸入會指定 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式資訊清單。For a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment manifest, this input specifies the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest. 在 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，則[GenerateApplicationManifest 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a494102b-0cb2-4755-8e2a-d2c0f39fac1d)需要`EntryPoint`何時產生應用程式資訊清單。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], the [GenerateApplicationManifest Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a494102b-0cb2-4755-8e2a-d2c0f39fac1d) requires an `EntryPoint` when an application manifest is generated. (組件或原生資訊清單不需要 `EntryPoint`)。這項需求會強制執行建置錯誤 「 MSB3185:進入點未指定資訊清單。 」(Assembly or native manifests do not require an `EntryPoint`.) This requirement is enforced by the build error "MSB3185: EntryPoint not specified for manifest." 在 [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]不會發出此錯誤時`EntryPoint`工作參數未指定。In [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] does not issue this error when the `EntryPoint` task parameter is not specified. 相反地， \ 標記會插入做為子系的\<進入點 > 標記，例如，如下所示。Instead, the \ tag is inserted as a child of the \ tag, for example, as follows. ```xml ``` 您可以使用下列步驟，將 DLL 相依性加入至應用程式資訊清單︰You can add DLL dependencies to the application manifest by using the following steps: 1. 所使用的呼叫來解析組件中的參考。Resolve the references in the assembly by using a call to . 2. 將上一個工作和組件本身的輸出傳遞至 。Pass the output of the previous task and the assembly itself to . 3. 使用 `Dependencies` 參數將相依性傳遞至 。Pass the dependencies by using the `Dependencies` parameter to .

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式所需的最小 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum version of the Common Language Runtime (CLR) required by the application.

value.span: 應用程式所需的最小 CLR 版本。

span.span: The minimum version of the CLR required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，值會是建置系統所使用的 CLR 版本。By default, the value is the CLR version in use by the build system. 如果工作要產生原生資訊清單，則會忽略這個屬性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作要產生原生資訊清單，則會忽略這個屬性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

summary.span: 取得或設定項目清單，這份清單會為所產生的資訊清單定義一組相依組件。

span.span: Gets or sets an item list that defines the set of dependent assemblies for the generated manifest.

value.span: 相依組件名稱的項目清單。

span.span: An item list of dependent assembly names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個項目可能會進一步說明的項目中繼資料，以指出其他部署狀態和相依性的類型。Each item may be further described by item metadata to indicate additional deployment state and the kind of dependence.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page that is displayed in dialog boxes during ClickOnce installations.

value.span: 代表網頁 URL 的字串值。

span.span: A string value that represents the URL of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定在 ClickOnce 安裝期間所顯示的對話方塊中顯示的網頁。Specifies a Web page to be displayed in dialog boxes that are displayed during ClickOnce installations.

summary.span: 取得或設定與 ClickOnce 部署資訊清單相關聯之一個或多個檔案類型的清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of one or more file type that are associated with the ClickOnce deployment manifest.

summary.span: 檔案關聯只有在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 (含) 以後版本作為目標時才有效。

span.span: File associations only valid only when [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 or later is targeted.

value.span: 與產生的資訊清單相關聯之檔案類型的清單。

span.span: A list of file types that are associated with the generated manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案類型可以是自訂的。File types can be custom. 以下是範例[ \ 項目 （ClickOnce 應用程式）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f951b4f-54f9-412e-a9e5-af4e379fcf08):The following is an example of a [\ Element (ClickOnce Application)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f951b4f-54f9-412e-a9e5-af4e379fcf08): ```xml NewYorkTimes.Document nyt.ico New York Times Reader document ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示應用程式是否裝載於瀏覽器中 (與 WPF 的 Web Browser Applications 相同)。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the application is hosted in a browser (as are WPF Web Browser Applications).

value.span: 布林值，這個值表示即將部署的應用程式會裝載在瀏覽器 ()，或者不會裝載在瀏覽器 ()。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application being deployed will be hosted in a browser (), or not ().

value.span: 僅適用於 WPF Web 瀏覽器應用程式。

span.span: only applies to WPF Web Browser Applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於 WPF Web 瀏覽器應用程式以外的專案類型，設定至`false`（預設值）。For project types other than WPF Web Browser Applications, set to `false` (the default value). 當您部署 WPF 網頁瀏覽器應用程式時，您必須設定屬性設`true`。When you deploy a WPF Web Browser Application, you must set the property to `true`. 這會導致``標記新增至產生的應用程式資訊清單中，啟用 ClickOnce 部署瀏覽器裝載應用程式的專案，其中包含.xbap 檔案。This causes the `` tag to be added to the generated application manifest, enabling ClickOnce to deploy projects for browser-hosted applications, which contain .xbap files. 您也必須將應用程式提供線上只是藉由設定至`false`。You also have to make the application available online only by setting to `false`. 如果不符合此條件，您會收到[MSBuild 錯誤 MSB3116](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的圖示檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the application's icon file.

value.span: 要用於應用程式的圖示檔。

span.span: The icon file to use for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式圖示表示產生的應用程式資訊清單中，適用於**開始** 功能表並在**解除安裝或變更程式** 對話方塊。The application icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used on the **Start** menu and in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box. 如果未指定這項輸入，便會使用預設圖示。If this input is not specified, a default icon is used. 如果工作要產生原生資訊清單，則會忽略這個屬性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ IsolatedComReferences { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定要在所產生資訊清單中隔離的 COM 元件。

span.span: Gets or sets COM components to isolate in the generated manifest.

value.span: 要在所產生資訊清單中隔離的 COM 元件。

span.span: The COM components to isolate in the generated manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您找出 「 免註冊的 COM 」 部署的 COM 元件。This property lets you isolate COM components for "Registration Free COM" deployment. 其運作方式是自動產生具有標準的 COM 註冊定義資訊清單。It works by auto-generating a manifest that has standard COM registration definitions. 必須在組建電腦上註冊 COM 元件。The COM components must be registered on the build computer.

summary.span: 取得或設定要產生的資訊清單類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of manifest to generate.

value.span: 要產生資訊清單的類型。

span.span: The kind of manifest to generate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `Native` - `ClickOnce` 如果未指定此屬性，工作就會預設為`ClickOnce`。If this property is not specified, the task defaults to `ClickOnce`.

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式所需的最低作業系統 (OS) 版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the operating system (OS) version that is the minimum required by the application.

value.span: 應用程式所需的最低作業系統版本。

span.span: The OS version that is the minimum required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，"5.1.2600.0"的值表示作業系統是 Windows XP。For example, the value "5.1.2600.0" indicates that the operating system is Windows XP. 如果未指定此屬性，則會使用值"4.10.0.0"。If this property is not specified, the value "4.10.0.0" is used. 這表示 Windows 98 Second Edition，也就是支援的最小作業系統[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。This indicates Windows 98 Second Edition, which is the minimum supported operating system for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如果工作是要產生原生資訊清單，則會忽略這項輸入。If the task is generating a native manifest, this input is ignored.

summary.span: 在專案檔中指定 ProductName 屬性。

span.span: Specifies the ProductName property in the project file.

value.span: 字串值，對應為ProductName專案檔中的屬性。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the ProductName property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`ProductName`專案檔中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `ProductName` property in the project file. 預設值為 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果`ProductName`為 null 並是`true`，RegisteredOrganization 值在登錄中的寫入至應用程式資訊清單。If `ProductName` is null and is `true`, the RegisteredOrganization value in the registry is written to the application manifest. 如果 RegisteredOrganization 也是 null，則會使用組件名稱。If RegisteredOrganization is also null, the assembly name is used.

span.span: Specifies the PublisherName property in the project file.

value.span: 字串值，對應為PublisherName專案檔中的屬性。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the PublisherName property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`PublisherName`專案檔中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `PublisherName` property in the project file. 預設值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果`PublisherName`為 null 並是`true`，組件名稱會寫入應用程式資訊清單。If `PublisherName` is null and is `true`, the assembly name is written to the application manifest.

summary.span: 取得或設定可指定應用程式安全性的 XML 文件。

span.span: Gets or sets an XML document that specifies the application security.

value.span: 指定應用程式安全性的 XML 文件。

span.span: The XML document that specifies the application security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 文件中的根項目必須是 asm.v2 命名空間中的 trustInfo 節點。The root element in the XML document must be a trustInfo node in the asm.v2 namespace. 如果工作要產生原生資訊清單，則會忽略這個屬性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

summary.span: 指定 、 和 屬性是否寫入應用程式資訊清單中。

span.span: Specifies whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 布林值，指出 、 和 屬性是否會寫入應用程式資訊清單 ()。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest ().

value.span: 如果值是 ，則會忽略這些屬性。

span.span: If the value is , these properties are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，並屬性預設為`null`。The , , and properties default to `null`. 這些屬性才會使用是`true`; 如果因此，這些屬性的值會寫入應用程式資訊清單中的對應標記。These properties are only used if is `true`; if so, the values of these properties are written to the corresponding tags in the application manifest. 如果是`false`（預設值），這些屬性會被忽略。If is `false` (the default value), these properties are ignored.
